awards.text: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Two British agents are murdered by a mysterious Neonazi organization in West Berlin. The British Secret Service sends agent Quiller to investigate. Soon Quiller is confronted with Neonazi chief "Oktober" and involved in a dangerous game where each side tries to find out the enemy's headquarters at any price...

title: The Quiller Memorandum
writers: Trevor Dudley Smith (based on the novel by)
